Shift Viewpoint Chrome Extension User Guide
Welcome to Shift Viewpoint, a fun tool that lets you play with image perspectives! Here’s how to use this extension:
[Upload Image]
Click the extension button, then select and upload the image you want to edit.

[Adjust Perspective]
Use the controls to adjust the image's perspective and depth. You can freely flip, tilt, and stretch the image, giving it a whole new look.

[Local Processing]
All image processing is done locally, ensuring that your photos are not sent to the internet, keeping your privacy safe.

Come and experience Shift Viewpoint, and explore more fun image perspectives!

欢迎使用 Shift Viewpoint，一款能让你玩转图片视角的有趣工具！以下是使用本扩展的方法：

【上传图片】
点击扩展按钮，选择并上传你想要处理的图片。

【调整视角】
使用控件调整图片的视角和深度。你可以随意翻转、倾斜和拉升图片，让它焕然一新。

【本地处理】
所有图片处理均在本地完成，确保你的照片不会被发送到外网，隐私安全有保障。

快来体验 Shift Viewpoint，探索更多有趣的图片视角吧！
